Summary: Huge contrail right over my apartment building
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around September 5th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI took my dog out around 5am this morning and exited the building from the north entrance. I always look up and the skies were perfectly clear and it was still dark. We walked around to the front of the complex on the south side and re-entered the building and then exited the building again on the west side. I didn't look up again until we reached the south side again, and when I did, I saw a huge big white contrail of smoke or clouds that was very low and looked to be literally right over my building that wasn't there before. I could only see that the direction of the trail was stretched diagonally from somewhere over my building going towards out over the highway extension behind my building. I must repeat that when I'd looked up at the sky more or less in that same spot about 10 minutes before that, there was absolutely nothing there. I didn't see anything or hear a single sound and there was no breeze either. I wish I'd thought to get a picture of it with my camera at the time but for some reason I didn't. It's actually pretty unnerving to think of what could have made a large trail of smoke like that right over my building and for me to not have seen or heard a thing just prior to it.
